name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lawrence LYNCH, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lawrence LYNCH, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of August, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
51 A.3d 179
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Lawrence LYNCH, Petitioner.
No. 69 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 8, 2012.
